items.key: (user_yn = 1 and admin = 0 and name <> '{$%c[user]}') and (@@admin = 1 or dbo.ff_ExactInlist(name, (select restrict_users from userinfo2 where id = @@userID)) = 1)
items.check: (user_yn = 1 and admin = 0 and name <> '{$%c[user]}') and (@@admin = 1 or dbo.ff_ExactInlist(name, (select restrict_users from userinfo2 where id = @@userID)) = 1)

command.text:
if (@@admin <> 1) begin if not exists(select 1 from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where id = @@userID and restrict_yn = '1') begin select '$NotAuthorized' as message return end
if not exists(select 1 from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where id = @@userID and dbo.ff_ExactInlist(rtrim(@user), restrict_users) = 1) begin select '$NotAuthorized' as message return end
if not exists(select 1 from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where id = @@userID and dbo.ff_ExactInlist(rtrim(@target), restrict_users) = 1) begin select '$NotAuthorized' as message return end end
declare @id int select @id = id from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where name = @user select '' as field, '' as message, 'Treeview.Treeview.Update.CopyRight(' + rtrim(@@userID) + ',' + rtrim(@id) + ',' + @user + ',' + @target + ',' + '@@appDatabaseName' + ',' + @@language + ', true' + ')' as invoke, 'on$CopyRight$Completed(this);' as script return
